html:
{{letter_head}}

MONEY RECEIPT

{{ doc.branch }}

MR. No. {{doc.name}}

Received with thanks from {{doc.party}} the sum of {{ (frappe.utils.money_in_words(doc.paid_amount))}} by (Cash/Cheque/Scan and Pay/Credit Card/Bank Draft) {{doc.reference_no}} on date {{doc.reference_date}} in payment for {{doc.remarks}}

Nu. {{'{0:,.2f}'.format(doc.paid_amount)}}

This print is system generated and should be considered VALID only with appropriate seal and/or signature.
Printed by {{ frappe.user }} on {{ frappe.utils.nowdate() }} at {{ frappe.utils.nowtime() }}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}
name: PE Money Print
